body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery               Photo Gallery        Pueblos on the Wupatki Grasslands NPS Photo (H.Rich)   Â                 Landscapes of Wupatki   9 Photos  From desert scrub to open grasslands and Painted Desert vistas, Wupatki's varied landscapes are spectacular.           Pueblos of Wupatki    17 Photos  There are six pueblos open to the public at Wupatki National Monument          Wildlife of Wupatki   7 Photos  Wildlife of Wupatki            Wupatki Interpretive Garden   17 Photos  Check back regularly to see what's blooming. The garden is made possible by our dedicated volunteers, the Friends of the Monument, and your generous donations          What's Blooming - Monsoon Edition   9 Photos  There are over 240 species of plants within Wupatki National Monument. Here's a look at what's blooming during the late summer monsoons.          Archaeology Month Events   7 Photos  Every year, National Park Service archaeologists at Wupatki celebrate Archaeology Month and Archaeology Day with events and activities.
title: Wupatki National Monument: Photo Gallery
